properties.Text: Northern GRA: From November 1 through December 31, all trawl vessels fishing for longfin squid, black sea bass, or silver hake (whiting) must fish with nets that have a minimum mesh size of 5.0 inch diamond mesh, applied throughout the codend for at least 75 continuous meshes forward of the terminus of the net. For trawl nets with codends (including an extension) of fewer than 75 meshes, the entire trawl net must have a minimum mesh size of 5.0 inches (12.7 cm) throughout the net.

Southern GRA: From January 1 through March 15, all trawl vessels fishing for longfin squid, black sea bass, or silver hake (whiting) must fish with nets that have a minimum mesh size of 5.0 inch diamond mesh, applied throughout the codend for at least 75 continuous meshes forward of the terminus of the net. For trawl nets with codends (including an extension) of fewer than 75 meshes, the entire trawl net must have a minimum mesh size of 5.0 inches (12.7 cm) throughout the net.
